articles.title: Anthropic 20 milyar dolarlık yatırım turuna yaklaşıyor
articles.title_tr: Anthropic 20 milyar dolarlık yatırım turuna yaklaşıyor
articles.summary: Anthropic, 350 milyar dolarlık bir değerlemeyle 20 milyar dolarlık yeni sermaye toplama sürecini tamamlamaya hazırlanıyor. Yatırım turuna katılması beklenen fonlar arasında Altimeter Capital Management, Sequoia Capital, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Menlo Ventures, Coatue Management, Iconiq Capital ve Singapur'un devlet varlık fonu yer alırken, fonun büyük kısmının şirketin stratejik ortakları Nvidia ve Microsoft'tan gelmesi bekleniyor.
articles.summary_tr: Anthropic, 350 milyar dolarlık bir değerlemeyle 20 milyar dolarlık yeni sermaye toplama sürecini tamamlamaya hazırlanıyor. Yatırım turuna katılması beklenen fonlar arasında Altimeter Capital Management, Sequoia Capital, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Menlo Ventures, Coatue Management, Iconiq Capital ve Singapur'un devlet varlık fonu yer alırken, fonun büyük kısmının şirketin stratejik ortakları Nvidia ve Microsoft'tan gelmesi bekleniyor.
articles.long_summary: Anthropic, 350 milyar dolarlık bir değerlemeyle 20 milyar dolarlık yeni sermaye toplama sürecini tamamlamaya hazırlanıyor. Yatırım turuna katılması beklenen fonlar arasında Altimeter Capital Management, Sequoia Capital, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Menlo Ventures, Coatue Management, Iconiq Capital ve Singapur'un devlet varlık fonu yer alırken, fonun büyük kısmının şirketin stratejik ortakları Nvidia ve Microsoft'tan gelmesi bekleniyor.
articles.long_summary_tr: Anthropic, 350 milyar dolarlık bir değerlemeyle 20 milyar dolarlık yeni sermaye toplama sürecini tamamlamaya hazırlanıyor. Yatırım turuna katılması beklenen fonlar arasında Altimeter Capital Management, Sequoia Capital, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Menlo Ventures, Coatue Management, Iconiq Capital ve Singapur'un devlet varlık fonu yer alırken, fonun büyük kısmının şirketin stratejik ortakları Nvidia ve Microsoft'tan gelmesi bekleniyor.

articles.title: Aygaz 2025 yılını 5 milyar TL net kâr ile tamamladı
articles.title_tr: Aygaz 2025 yılını 5 milyar TL net kâr ile tamamladı
articles.summary: Aygaz, 2025 yılının tamamında 5 milyar TL net kâr elde ederken, 2025 yılı dördüncü çeyreğinde 2,1 milyar TL net kâr açıkladı. Böylece şirket, analistlerin 1,8 milyar TL seviyesindeki dördüncü çeyrek net kâr beklentisinin üzerinde bir sonuç açıklamış oldu.

articles.title: Huawei’nin Yeni Ürünlerinin Türkiye Fiyatı Açıklandı!
articles.title_tr: Huawei’nin Yeni Ürünlerinin Türkiye Fiyatı Açıklandı!
articles.summary: Huawei, teknoloji dünyasının merakla beklediği yeni amiral gemisi ürünlerini İstanbul’da gerçekleştirdiği “Yenilikçi Teknolojiler Galası” ile tanıttı. Teknoloji ve estetiği bir araya getiren bu özel gecede, markanın katlanabilir telefonlardan giyilebilir teknolojilere kadar en yeni çözümleri sahne aldı. articles.title: Hideo Kojima’s Timing Is Interesting As He Posts A Trailer Update Before State Of Play Day
articles.title_tr: Hideo Kojima’s Timing Is Interesting As He Posts A Trailer Update Before State Of Play Day
articles.summary: A new State of Play livestream has been confirmed for February 12, but just minutes before Sony made the announcement, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach game director Hideo Kojima also teased… something. The veteran game developer has been busy in his editing studio lately, putting together a trailer for the first time in eight months.While he didn't have time to finish his work, he did post a photo of his desktop setup, including a close-up of his display.Granted, "a Hideo Kojima" screen doesn't say much, but people are already speculating that a PC port of Death Stranding 2 is being prepped for a reveal this month. The game has been a PS5 exclusive since June 26, 2025, and in the wake of an ESRB rating for a PC version that was later deleted, it looks likely that an announcement is on the way, given Kojima's close relationship with PlayStation.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Overwatch Team Is "Not Comfortable" Releasing AI-Generated Content, But That's Not A "Forever" Policy
articles.title_tr: Overwatch Team Is "Not Comfortable" Releasing AI-Generated Content, But That's Not A "Forever" Policy
articles.summary: Overwatch game director Aaron Keller has stated that developer Blizzard has no intention of releasing AI-generated content in the game, with the company instead aiming for the hero shooter to have a "handcrafted" feel to it. At the same time, Blizzard president Johanna Faries outlined the company's overall approach to AI, saying the technology holds many possible benefits."We don't want to put AI-generated content out in front of players. That's just not something that we're comfortable doing. We want this to feel like a handcrafted universe, and it is a handcrafted universe," Keller told GameSpot."It's a moving space. I don't know where player, or society's perception of this is going to be five years or ten years from now. So it's not like... I don't think there is ever going to be a, 'Hey, here's a forever policy around it,' but that's just where we're at right now," he explained.Continue Reading at GameSpot
articles.summary_tr: Overwatch game director Aaron Keller has stated that developer Blizzard has no intention of releasing AI-generated content in the game, with the company instead aiming for the hero shooter to have a "handcrafted" feel to it. At the same time, Blizzard president Johanna Faries outlined the company's overall approach to AI, saying the technology holds many possible benefits."We don't want to put AI-generated content out in front of players. That's just not something that we're comfortable doing. We want this to feel like a handcrafted universe, and it is a handcrafted universe," Keller told GameSpot."It's a moving space. I don't know where player, or society's perception of this is going to be five years or ten years from now. So it's not like... I don't think there is ever going to be a, 'Hey, here's a forever policy around it,' but that's just where we're at right now," he explained.Continue Reading at GameSpot

At the same time, Blizzard president Johanna Faries outlined the company's overall approach to AI, saying the technology holds many possible benefits."We don't want to put AI-generated content out in front of players. That's just not something that we're comfortable doing.

At the same time, Blizzard president Johanna Faries outlined the company's overall approach to AI, saying the technology holds many possible benefits."We don't want to put AI-generated content out in front of players. That's just not something that we're comfortable doing.
